nietzsche.text: What is evil? Everything that comes from weakness.
nietzsche.origin_text: Was it schlecht? Alles, was aus der Schwäche stammt.
nietzsche.author: F.W. Nietzsche “Antichrist

la_rochefoucauld.text: It takes great talent to hide your talent.
la_rochefoucauld.origin_text: C'est une grande habileté que de savoir cacher son habileté.
la_rochefoucauld.author: La Rochefoucauld “Reflection or Didactic Proverbs” or “Collection of Proverbs” (Proverbs No. 245)
la_rochefoucauld.origin_author: Réflexions ou sentences et maximes morales

adam_smith.text: Humans are the only animals that trade. No dogs exchange bones.
adam_smith.origin_text: Man is the only animal that does business; No dog exchanges bones with another.
adam_smith.author: Adam Smith “The Wealth of Nations”
adam_smith.origin_author: An Inquiry into the Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations
